config.directions: Move the slider to explore the timeline.

entries.content:
Pyrrhic Wars: c. 281 BCE–275 BCE. Known for:

  • wars between Pyrrhus, the King of Epirus and the Romans

Punic Wars: c. 264 BCE–146 BCE. Known for:

  • wars between Carthage and Rome
  • the Barca Family
  • the Scipio Family
  • the Carthaginian, Hannibal
  • the Roman general, Scipio Africanus
  • the Roman general, Scipio Aemilianus
entries.alt: Picture of Hannibal on war elephants with his men marching underneath him
